history.content:
Please confirm the following information with the professors: 

- R1B ask the professor if there is a final to ensure there is not time conflict with the 16B final as professor will not provide alternate exams. 
- Contact the 16B professors to ask if attendance for lectures is required and if they will be recorded.
- If you want to take 16B waitlist the class now or they may be open spots. If you do not have a time conflict with final and 16B confirm lectures are recorded then email ee-scheduling@eecs.berkeley.edu.

children.subject: Thank you so much for the response. I have already done everything you have mentioned. 16b lectures are entirely asynchronous and r1b does not have a final exam. I am already on the waitlist for 16b and my position is 13th on the waitlist. The problem is that I believe calcentral wouldn't allow me to enrol if and once I am off the waitlist since 16b says that it does not allow time conflict enrolment even though that is clearly not the case here. I have emailed ee-scheduling@eecs.berkeley.edu about the same.

history.content: I am a sophomore majoring in EECS and I really want to take 16B with Professor Sahai but a time conflict with R1B does not allow me to enrol. I can't drop R1B since I am an international and it is my only in person class hence I need to have it to stay in the states, also my schedule wouldn't allow me to take it next semester either. R1B doesn't have a final exam so that would not be an issue and I believe 16b lectures are asynchronous. I was hoping to get a permission number to enrol for 16b this semster as it is a course I really wish to take. Please let me know if something can be done.
history.subject: 16B enrolment time conflict with R1B
